title: bOING bOING Issue 10 - Sex Candy for Happy Mutants
creator: Happy Mutants
description: bOING bOING started as a zine in 1988 by Mark Frauenfelder and Carla Sinclair, his wife. Issues were subtitled "The World's Greatest Neurozine". Associate editors included Gareth Branwyn, Jon Lebkowsky, and Paco Nathan. Along with Mondo 2000 , bOING bOING was an influence in the development of the cyberpunk subculture. It reached a maximum circulation of 17,500 copies. Common themes include technology, futurism, science fiction, gadgets, intellectual property, Disney and left-wing politics. The last issue of the zine was #15. Contents a real man - fiction bill eakin bottled libido: aphrodisiacs - mark frauenfelder & paco xander nathan virtual sex - jon lebkowsky & barry atkinson holy whores! - dianna rose hard(wo)mann future sex review - carla sinclair confessions of a pc porn fanatic - gareth branwyn my lil' sex robot: vibrator review - darby & kerin femme's fast-forward festival - gareth branwyn skid row crackheads get horny too - barry atkinson tuppy owens: my favorite sex maniac - gareth branwyn & mark frauenfelder eros comics - gareth branwyn welcome - mark frauenfelder bouncing back: letters to the editor notices neurotica prank! - carla sinclair cranks alcor too much coffee man - shannon wheeler fiction that bleeds truth - jon lebkowsky way off the newsstand ask dr sergic larri, m.d. and paco xander nathan zip.2 - rudy rucker neoluddite computer solution - peter sugarman classified ads the best of factsheet five electric - jerod pore timewave zero - paco xander nathan videos looks at books catalogs comix zines music peter stafford - thomas lyttle brenda laurel - spiros antonopulas & andrea barnett marc laidlaw - rudy rucker terence mckenna - carla sinclair lords of acid - gareth branwyn
